credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Ulysesses Discovers Achilles in Scyros
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue laid paper
description: Ulysses sits at right at table, at whose other end Achilles stands in garb of maiden, holding a helmet and sword. Frightened Deidamia speaks him. Six more girls are shown.
name: Drawing
